Listing 17.1: Example of loading the dataset.
Next, we can mark all missing values indicated with a ‘?’ character with a NaN value, which
is a ﬂoat. This will allow us to work with the data as one array of ﬂoating point values rather
than mixed types (less eﬃcient.)
